description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In 1993 a group of Satanic Estate Agents bought up property in key areas of the world to act as a demonic staging area and gateway to the depths of hell,  summoning forth unspeakable evil. LOL LOL Kitty, a weaponized house cat and  government black project is deployed  by the US Military in order to take out  the trash.
